name: SNAKE 3310
description:
Controls: 

ARROW KEYS | Navigate

Input not working? Try clicking on the game window and then press an input button.

SNAKE 3310 - A nostalgic horror experience.

An immersive Nokia3310 simulator, made in 4 days for the Nokia3310 Jam
